short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to introduce AI and GPT into your browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing DephraseAI, the ultimate writing companion designed to refine and elevate your content. Harnessing the power of advanced AI technology, DephraseAI offers an array of intelligent features to enhance your writing experience. Seamlessly improve sentence structures, rephrase complex ideas, and effortlessly fine-tune your text with precision and ease. Whether you're a professional writer, student, or content creator, DephraseAI empowers you to communicate your thoughts with clarity and impact. Unlock the full potential of your writing with DephraseAI and experience the next generation of language refinement.

Features include:
GPT completion
Text/paragraph improvement
Google search assistant
AI summaries
Usable in ALL sites (google docs, gmail, etc...)
